title: Bug 114470[Smoke] Error message throws when using new Date("3/2/2005") as value in table filter.
description: When using the value new Date("3/2/2005") in a table filter, an error message is displayed.
OB: When using the value new Date("3/2/2005") in a table filter, an error message is thrown.
EB: The value new Date("3/2/2005") should not trigger an error message and the table filter should work as expected.
SR:
1. Create a new datasource and dataset that contains a datetime column.
2. Insert a table and create a filter based on the datetime column.
3. In the filter configuration, set value1 to 'new Date("3/2/2005")'.
